item.title: How to Pick a Reading Light
item.description: A reading light is a must have gadget for most avid readers. If you are in the market for a reading light, you might find a dizzying array of options available to you. Deciding which one to pick largely depends on your reading style. With this post, I offer some helpful advice on things to consider when buying a reading light.
